    The first step is to define the project scope. 
    The next step is to identify the key stakeholders.

analyzed_chunks.name: VoiceTree application test
analyzed_chunks.text: This is a test of the VoiceTree application.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This chunk introduces the application being discussed. Since there are no existing nodes, and it doesn't directly relate to the other sub-chunks, it's best to mark it as having no relevant node for now.

analyzed_chunks.name: Create new node: planning
analyzed_chunks.text: I want to create a new node about project planning.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This chunk expresses the intention to discuss project planning. The subsequent chunks seem to detail steps within that planning process. Therefore, this chunk sets the context for the following chunks.

analyzed_chunks.name: Step 1: Define scope
analyzed_chunks.text: The first step is to define the project scope.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This chunk describes the first step in project planning. It directly follows the intention declared in the 'Create new node: planning' chunk. Therefore, it's a continuation of that idea.

analyzed_chunks.name: Step 2: Identify stakeholders
analyzed_chunks.text: The next step is to identify the key stakeholders.
analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This chunk describes the second step in project planning, following the definition of scope. It's a continuation of the planning process initiated in 'Create new node: planning' and follows 'Step 1: Define scope'.

integration_decisions.name: Introduction to the Project
integration_decisions.text: Okay, so let's start with the introduction to the project.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Initiates the discussion by introducing the project.
integration_decisions.content: Okay, so let's start with the introduction to the project.

integration_decisions.name: Project Goal
integration_decisions.text: The goal of this project is to create a comprehensive guide on how to build a birdhouse.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project aims to create a comprehensive guide on building a birdhouse.
integration_decisions.content: The goal of this project is to create a comprehensive guide on how to build a birdhouse.

integration_decisions.name: Target Audience
integration_decisions.text: This guide is aimed at beginners with little to no woodworking experience.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The guide is designed for beginners without prior woodworking experience.
integration_decisions.content: This guide is aimed at beginners with little to no woodworking experience.

integration_decisions.name: Guide Structure
integration_decisions.text: We'll start with selecting materials, then move on to cutting, assembly, and finally, finishing touches.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The guide will cover material selection, cutting, assembly, and finishing touches.
integration_decisions.content: We'll start with selecting materials, then move on to cutting, assembly, and finally, finishing touches.

integration_decisions.name: Material Selection
integration_decisions.text: So, first, let's talk about selecting the right materials for our birdhouse.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Initiates the discussion on selecting appropriate materials for the birdhouse.
integration_decisions.content: So, first, let's talk about selecting the right materials for our birdhouse.

integration_decisions.name: Wood Type Recommendation
integration_decisions.text: For beginners, I recommend using cedar or pine because they are easy to work with and weather-resistant.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Recommends cedar or pine for beginners due to their workability and weather resistance.
integration_decisions.content: For beginners, I recommend using cedar or pine because they are easy to work with and weather-resistant.

integration_decisions.name: Alternative Wood Types
integration_decisions.text: You could also use plywood, but it requires more care in sealing the edges to prevent water damage.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Suggests plywood as an alternative, but notes the need for careful edge sealing to prevent water damage.
integration_decisions.content: You could also use plywood, but it requires more care in sealing the edges to prevent water damage.

integration_decisions.name: Fastener Choices
integration_decisions.text: As for fasteners, galvanized nails or screws are best to prevent rusting.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Recommends galvanized nails or screws to prevent rusting.
integration_decisions.content: As for fasteners, galvanized nails or screws are best to prevent rusting.

integration_decisions.name: Cutting Tools
integration_decisions.text: Now that we have our materials, let's talk about cutting.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Transitions the discussion to cutting the materials.
integration_decisions.content: Now that we have our materials, let's talk about cutting.

integration_decisions.name: Saw Recommendation
integration_decisions.text: A simple handsaw or a jigsaw will work for most of the cuts.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Suggests using a handsaw or jigsaw for most of the cuts.
integration_decisions.content: A simple handsaw or a jigsaw will work for most of the cuts.

integration_decisions.name: Safety First
integration_decisions.text: Remember to always wear safety glasses when cutting!
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Emphasizes the importance of wearing safety glasses while cutting.
integration_decisions.content: Remember to always wear safety glasses when cutting!

integration_decisions.name: Assembly Techniques
integration_decisions.text: Okay, so after cutting all the pieces, we can start with the assembly.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Moves on to discussing the assembly process after cutting the pieces.
integration_decisions.content: Okay, so after cutting all the pieces, we can start with the assembly.

integration_decisions.name: Joining Method
integration_decisions.text: I recommend using wood glue in addition to nails or screws for a stronger bond.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Recommends using wood glue along with nails or screws for a stronger bond during assembly.
integration_decisions.content: I recommend using wood glue in addition to nails or screws for a stronger bond.

integration_decisions.name: Clamping Advice
integration_decisions.text: Clamps can be very helpful to hold the pieces together while the glue dries.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Suggests using clamps to hold pieces together while the glue dries during assembly.
integration_decisions.content: Clamps can be very helpful to hold the pieces together while the glue dries.

integration_decisions.name: Finishing Touches
integration_decisions.text: Finally, let's talk about the finishing touches to protect the birdhouse from the elements.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Transitions to discussing finishing touches to protect the birdhouse.
integration_decisions.content: Finally, let's talk about the finishing touches to protect the birdhouse from the elements.

integration_decisions.name: Sealing Recommendation
integration_decisions.text: Applying a non-toxic sealant or paint is a good idea.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Recommends applying a non-toxic sealant or paint for protection.
integration_decisions.content: Applying a non-toxic sealant or paint is a good idea.

integration_decisions.name: Drainage Holes
integration_decisions.text: Also, make sure to drill some drainage holes in the bottom to prevent water buildup.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Advises drilling drainage holes to prevent water buildup.
integration_decisions.content: Also, make sure to drill some drainage holes in the bottom to prevent water buildup.

results.transcript_text: Another thing I will have to do is start reaching out to investors to see what next steps they would recommend for me. I should talk to Austin's dad first.

analyzed_chunks.reasoning: This chunk describes a future action. The second chunk describes a specific person to talk to first, so this chunk is a continuation of the overall plan.

integration_decisions.name: Introduction to the Project
integration_decisions.text: Okay, so let's start with the introduction to the project.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Begins the project with an introductory statement.
integration_decisions.content: Okay, so let's start with the introduction to the project.

integration_decisions.name: Project Goal
integration_decisions.text: The goal is to create a knowledge graph from a conversation.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project aims to construct a knowledge graph based on a given conversation.
integration_decisions.content: The goal is to create a knowledge graph from a conversation.

integration_decisions.name: Data Source
integration_decisions.text: We'll be using a transcript of a conversation as our data source.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The data source for the knowledge graph will be a conversation transcript.
integration_decisions.content: We'll be using a transcript of a conversation as our data source.

integration_decisions.name: Step 1: Chunking
integration_decisions.text: The first step is to chunk the conversation into smaller, meaningful segments.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The initial step involves dividing the conversation into smaller, meaningful chunks.
integration_decisions.content: The first step is to chunk the conversation into smaller, meaningful segments.

integration_decisions.name: Chunking Explanation
integration_decisions.text: These chunks should represent individual ideas or pieces of information.
integration_decisions.content: These chunks should represent individual ideas or pieces of information.

integration_decisions.name: Step 2: Analysis
integration_decisions.text: Next, we need to analyze each chunk to understand its content and relationships to other chunks or existing knowledge.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The subsequent step involves analyzing each chunk to understand its content and relationships.
integration_decisions.content: Next, we need to analyze each chunk to understand its content and relationships to other chunks or existing knowledge.

integration_decisions.name: Analysis Details
integration_decisions.text: This involves identifying key concepts, entities, and the relationships between them.
integration_decisions.content: This involves identifying key concepts, entities, and the relationships between them.

integration_decisions.name: Step 3: Integration
integration_decisions.text: Finally, we integrate the analyzed chunks into the knowledge graph.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The final step is to integrate the analyzed chunks into the knowledge graph.
integration_decisions.content: Finally, we integrate the analyzed chunks into the knowledge graph.

integration_decisions.name: Integration Explanation
integration_decisions.text: This means creating new nodes and edges or appending information to existing nodes.
integration_decisions.content: This means creating new nodes and edges or appending information to existing nodes.

integration_decisions.name: Tools and Technologies
integration_decisions.text: We can use tools like Python with libraries such as NetworkX or RDFlib to build the knowledge graph.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Suggests using Python with libraries like NetworkX or RDFlib for building the knowledge graph.
integration_decisions.content: We can use tools like Python with libraries such as NetworkX or RDFlib to build the knowledge graph.

results.transcript_text: To be able to start reaching out to investors, I will first have to polish my POC. This involves refining the user interface, improving the summarization quality, and making sure the application is robust and easy to use. I'll also need to prepare a compelling pitch deck and presentation.

integration_decisions.name: Introduction to the Project
integration_decisions.text: The project aims to develop a personalized AI assistant.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project aims to develop a personalized AI assistant.
integration_decisions.content: The project aims to develop a personalized AI assistant.

integration_decisions.name: Key Features
integration_decisions.text: The assistant will offer scheduling, reminders, and information retrieval.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The AI assistant will offer scheduling, reminders, and information retrieval.
integration_decisions.content: The assistant will offer scheduling, reminders, and information retrieval.

integration_decisions.name: Personalization Details
integration_decisions.text: Personalization will be based on user preferences and past interactions.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Personalization of the AI assistant will be based on user preferences and past interactions.
integration_decisions.content: Personalization will be based on user preferences and past interactions.

integration_decisions.name: Data Sources
integration_decisions.text: Data will be gathered from calendar entries, contacts, and browsing history.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Data for personalization will be gathered from calendar entries, contacts, and browsing history.
integration_decisions.content: Data will be gathered from calendar entries, contacts, and browsing history.

integration_decisions.name: Privacy Considerations
integration_decisions.text: User data will be anonymized and securely stored.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: User data will be anonymized and securely stored to address privacy concerns.
integration_decisions.content: User data will be anonymized and securely stored.

integration_decisions.name: Development Team
integration_decisions.text: The team consists of AI specialists, software engineers, and UX designers.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project's development team consists of AI specialists, software engineers, and UX designers.
integration_decisions.content: The team consists of AI specialists, software engineers, and UX designers.

integration_decisions.name: Timeline
integration_decisions.text: The project is expected to be completed within 12 months.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The project is expected to be completed within 12 months.
integration_decisions.content: The project is expected to be completed within 12 months.

integration_decisions.name: First Milestone
integration_decisions.text: The first milestone is the completion of the core AI engine.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The first milestone in the project timeline is the completion of the core AI engine.
integration_decisions.content: The first milestone is the completion of the core AI engine.

integration_decisions.name: Testing Phase
integration_decisions.text: Extensive testing will be conducted to ensure reliability and accuracy.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: Extensive testing will be conducted to ensure the AI assistant's reliability and accuracy.
integration_decisions.content: Extensive testing will be conducted to ensure reliability and accuracy.

integration_decisions.name: Deployment Strategy
integration_decisions.text: The assistant will be initially deployed on mobile platforms.
integration_decisions.new_node_summary: The AI assistant will be initially deployed on mobile platforms as part of the deployment strategy.
integration_decisions.content: The assistant will be initially deployed on mobile platforms.
